name: PANAM KEBAB Ch√¢telain
search_query: PANAM KEBAB Ch√¢telain Ixelles Rue du Page 5

reviews.text:
What a fantastic find at Paname Kebab! Honestly, we loved it from start to finish.

You can immediately tell that everything is homemade, from the spit-roasted meat to the falafels and even the fries. It really makes all the difference, and you can taste it from the very first bite. The ingredients are delicious, fresh, and prepared with great care.

A huge plus is the service: the team is super friendly, welcoming, and makes you feel right at home. It's a great place to be, and it makes the experience even better.

Definitely a place we highly recommend if you're looking for a quality kebab. We'll definitely be back!

Absolutely delicious! The fries are excellent, by the way!
The staff are so friendly and professional, it makes you want to come back! ü§©
amazing !
Thanks Linaü•∞ ‚Ä¶

It's a shame you didn't enjoy the food.

Thank you nonetheless for the rating regarding the service!
Came hungry. Left happy. 10/10 would get sauce on my shirt again!
Simpy delicious !

Wonderful Charlotte...

We received a warm welcome.

Top-notch service.

Thank you so much, Charlotte.
The food, the staff, the atmosphere were all great.
Ouh üòç Benin barcha!!
Great place, great food, great staff & lots of sauce, all one can wish for.
Panam is definitely a must-stop when I'm in Brussels! It's fresh, delicious, and generous üòã a real treat, and the atmosphere is just as great üëäüèΩ
Simply the best in town!
Best place to eat at place du Chatelain!

By far the best kebab in Brussels (and even in Belgium).
The spit-roasted meat is truly homemade and the vegetables are incredibly fresh.
You go there to try it out and you keep going back again and again.
Really great d√∂ner for being outside of Germany! Great veggie options and a cool atmosphere
I highly recommend it! Great place, delicious kebab with quality ingredients and friendly staff. Thank you so much for the experience.

Absolutely amazing!!! A great menu, a warm and welcoming atmosphere, and top-notch staff and service!

I had a fantastic time with my daughter.
Delicious, fresh products and top-notch service! I highly recommend it.
Amazing place
Absolutely delicious and incredibly satisfying!! The marinated chicken skewer is a real treat. It feels just like home!!
Delicious kebabs that are a nice change from the usual! We enjoyed them from start to finish, and we especially loved the chicken. I highly recommend them :)
Thank you Anastasia üòä ‚Ä¶
Excellent kebab/doner! Amazing fries, homemade bread and sauces :-) and a great playlist to top it all off. Very welcoming staff too!
A delicious treat! And what service! Thank you for this wonderful experience, I will gladly return!
Second place that confirms the success of the first! What a treat!
Top quality! And super delicious. ‚ú®üî•

Wow!
Their homemade broccoli rabe is simply incredible! The team is amazing, thank you to Nasser and Charlotte for the service!
Well done, team!

Incredible experience at Panam!

We were missing this kind of place at Ch√¢telain.
Incredible! They opened at Fernand Coq a while ago, and I always wondered when they'd open a second Panam because it's absolutely delicious üòã Well, they did!! Well done, team üëë
Great place in a lovely neighborhood! Excellent service and delicious food, I highly recommend it.
Chicken Berliner durum with extra halloumi! So good!

Halloumi as a side is crazy good.

I reccomend.
Excellent kebab, fresh ingredients. Bakery-style doner, homemade sauce, spit-roasted meat, and condiments. A real treat. I highly recommend it for a quality kebab.

name: Ornina Ch√¢telain
search_query: Ornina Ch√¢telain Ixelles Rue du Page 24

reviews.text:
Saturday night, and our lack of planning had us in tricky spot. We luckily ended up here and had an absolutely incredible meal. Delicious food, incredible flavors, warm service. Even our pickiest child was reaching about it.

We all agreed: it was lucky our original dinner plans fell through so we could end up here.
Delicious food! Both sweet and savory. If you're looking for a vegan-friendly place in Bailli to grab a quick bite, this is the spot! Best Syrian sandwich I ever had!
Delicious sweets. My preference is anything with pistachio. We had a chance to taste before choosing which was great. Extremely welcoming and helpful staff.
They have amazing desserts to share with friends. Also the balance in sweetness is perfect and not dripping of sugar. Also my vegan friends were delighted to taste some of their creations.
Delicious Syrian treats and home goods! Incredible quality and entirely handmade. Costly for portion size but a great way to support artisanal.

The best Syrian sweet in Europe! Top quality
Original test!
Low-sugar and vegan options are available
Must visit and try

Damascus-style sweets with no added sugar!

Love how the flavor of the nuts and fruits come through, instead of a heavy sweetness. Great for kid‚Äôs collation/snacks as well.

Kind owner. Try the ice cream!

I am syrian and I confirm that this is the best syrian sweets in Europe! You can taste the balance between the nuts and sweets. They have gluten-free and sugar-free choices also... don't forget the gift ideas that you can find too üòâ
Excellent ! The owner is super nice and their food is simply delicious! Also really nice music

The sweets are the tastiest I've ever had! They don't add a lot of sugar, and the varieties with nuts are very creative. Everything tastes good and looks good as well! The decoration is simple and cozy. The presentation of the products is in and of itself a work of art! The employees are very friendly and generous! The overall quality to price ratio is excellent! I'll definitely be back there again!
Delicious food, the woman at the counter is very friendly and the atmosphere is amazing. All products are home made, I took salt snack and they were very, very good! Will come back more often now.
The best sweet ever, elegant test, high quality and not too sugary. Highly recommended
Excellent sweets with of fresh delicious pistachios

I think it's normal for you to buy sweets, but to find memories that take you back to childhood is an amazing thing... especially if you are a vegetarian... or follow a diet... or reduce sugar... and there are options of unique nuts... you can You can learn more about it by visiting. Thank you, Ornina
Many sugar-free and gluten free options
Wonderful atmosphere, the owner is super nice and welcoming. Not to mention the sweets, very good and fresh!!

"Ornina Sweets offers an authentic and creatively crafted culinary experience rooted in a centuries-old heritage within the confectionery industry. If you seek delectable sweets with a truly golden touch, Ornina Sweets is a must-try."
The quality of the delights is superb. The owner is radiating kindness and hospitality. If you need a little gift or a small delight for yourself made with love, search no further.
Food is absolutely delicious and staff super friendly
Salty and sweet very tasty! Good also for vegan sugar free and gluten free
Incredibly nice service. Lots of vegan options that are marked as such. And the interior design is incredibly beautiful.
Wonderful shop and the best middle East Bahklawa.  Full of nuts and taste - and low calories üôÉ.  Very friendly staff ! Thank you Ornina Chatelain ! ü§©ü§©ü§© ‚Ä¶
Amazing deserts, highly recommend
The sweets are amazing and so is the girl at the counter. Lovely spot all around

Yummy cake, lots of gluten free and sugar options.
Worker gave me a free sample without asking very nice of him
Best Syrian sweets in Brussels, very nice location, beautiful shop and friendly staff. Highly recommended.
Delicious baklava and more. Fantastic gluten free, lactose free and vegan options.
Exceptional and amazing authentic Syrian sweets. What a luxury in brussels.

Such a good idea :) sweet with gluten-free and vegan üòòüòò
I love it
I highly recommended it ‚Ä¶
Best Syrian/Lebanese sweets in all Brussels! Highly recommended!
I love this place! It is the best sweets in Europ
Very high quality products, welcoming service and the place itself is very beautiful and pleasant.
Great place, nice vibe and quality food.
We are happy and proud of Ornina.. yes it's the best.. go ahead..
best Syrian sweets in Brussels!
lovely and friendly place
Must-see and must-eat!
Unique
What a wonderful sweet and savory culinary experience! A warm and genuine welcome. A wide range of delicious organic dishes, prepared with love. I highly recommend it.

Whether it's for a sweet treat or a quick lunch, the quality is guaranteed! Savor every bite; it's a true delight for the taste buds. Raw, unfussy flavors at a more than reasonable price. The service is extremely friendly and welcoming. A truly wonderful discovery.
Exquisite sweet and savory delights. The pistachio pastries are irresistible, and the welcome is warm! Thank you.
super cool place and the owner makes you a custom sandwich. In short, delicious!

The reviews are so positive, I don't dare to lower the stars too much. BUT I came this weekend for the first time. We tried the orange blossom cake, and unfortunately, my grandmother and I were quite disappointed. It lacked flavor, and we didn't taste the orange blossom. We also tried the Mutabal, which wasn't bad, but we expected a stronger flavor.
Based on other reviews, next time we should try the almond and pistachio pastries, which looked very good.
The staff was very friendly and welcoming :)
Delicious and very kind. Really nice!

Excellent, generous products and taste ü´∂
And a wonderful welcome too ‚Ä¶

A very pretty shop, almost like a jewelry store where the jewelry is made up of typical Syrian pastries. The service is friendly and welcoming. The pastries aren't too sweet and are definitely worth trying. I would gladly return.

Tastes absolutely ORIGINAL ü§©.
You can immediately tell that this pastry was made with love.
Absolutely fantastic üëå
The owner and staff are very friendly and personable.
The location is very elegant.
I highly recommend this shop.

Delicious without sugar, and the price is affordable considering the quality.

I highly recommend it.
The welcome was very friendly and the desserts were delicious. I highly recommend it.

A very nice, welcoming place with delicious pastries. This is the best Syrian pastry shop I've found in Brussels so far. Artisanal and homemade products, not too sweet and very varied. I recommend it!

reviews.text: Magnificent, as always ü§ó

Best snack bar around!!

The owner is incredibly kind and friendly, he remembers all orders, their fries are amazing, and their portions are generous!!

I highly recommend going there.

The quality is worth the trip! Although it's not exactly close to home, we go back regularly. Simply put, we've rarely eaten such good durums and pitas. The selection of meats and sauces is impressive, the vegetables are incredibly fresh, and the portions are particularly generous. Add to that crispy fries and impeccable service... An unpretentious place with exceptional quality.
Excellent snack bar, very friendly and welcoming owners, lean meat. The place is clean and everything is very fresh.
Very clean and welcoming. It‚Äôs delicious
Very good food, staff and the atmosphere is amazing!! Very clean and is placed in the city correct! Would love to go there again and again

The staff were extremely friendly, attentive, and professional. We felt very welcome. The service was quick, and they were helpful in every way. The food was truly excellent and delicious.

We will definitely return and wholeheartedly recommend this place to everyone.
Excellent snack bar! The food is fresh and delicious, and the service is fast. The staff is welcoming and always smiling. I highly recommend it!
Top service!

A truly top-notch snack! üëå The fries are perfectly golden, crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside. The portion is generous, beautifully presented, with flavorful, perfectly grilled meat. A simple yet delicious meal, perfect for a treat! üî•
Excellent durum and kapsalon. Friendly and welcoming staff.

I came by yesterday after 19 years with my two children and frankly we had a great time! Nothing to say, the food is great and very well served! The welcome is always so friendly! A word of advice if you pass by, stop by and you won't regret it üòâüëç ‚Ä¶

Best chip shop in Jette. Crispy fries, friendly staff, and fast. Highly recommended!
The best snack bar on Jette, definitely good food, top-notch service and a great atmosphere for a good time.

Best snack bar in town, in my opinion. Always greeted with a smile, impeccable hygiene, and above all: the food is amazing! Kudos to the owner for preparing my order in under 30 seconds so I could catch my train on time ‚Äì probably a world record!
